name: Production Inc.
description: Production Inc. is a 2D puzzle game where you can make a production line to manufacture objects in any shape you want. You will be running a factory whilst trying not to go bankrupt. At the end of the week you will have to pay the debt.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: openGL 4.0 Storage: 250 MB available space
